sentences.en: "So what do you think will happen?" he asked eagerly.
sentences.cn: “那么你觉得会发生什么？”他急切地问道。

sentences.en: A lot of the city's buildings are accidents waiting to happen.
sentences.cn: 该城市中许多楼房都存在事故隐患。

sentences.en: As it happens, I know someone who might be able to help.
sentences.cn: 真巧，我正好认识一个人，这个人也许帮得上忙。

sentences.en: Deep inside the awareness was stirring that something was about to happen.
sentences.cn: 内心深处隐隐感觉到有什么事即将发生。

sentences.en: Do not wait for good things to happen to you. You need to walk towards happiness.
sentences.cn: 不要等待好事降临，你要向幸福进发。

sentences.en: He couldn't help worrying obsessively about what would happen.
sentences.cn: 他禁不住时刻担心将会发生的事情。

sentences.en: I go all tingly when I think of what might happen.
sentences.cn: 我一想到可能发生的事就满心欢喜。

sentences.en: I happened to see James in town.
sentences.cn: 我碰巧在镇上遇见詹姆斯。

sentences.en: If you happen to talk to him, have him call me.
sentences.cn: 如果你碰巧能和他说话，让他给我打个电话。

sentences.en: It’s impossible to predict what will happen next.
sentences.cn: 不可能预测接下来会发生什么。

sentences.en: Lucy shut her eyes so she wouldn't see it happen.
sentences.cn: 露西闭上了眼睛，这样就不会看到它发生了。

sentences.en: Remember, keep a positive attitude and good things will happen.
sentences.cn: 记住：保持乐观的心态，好事自然会发生。

sentences.en: She carried on as if nothing had happened.
sentences.cn: 她继续干，似乎什么都未曾发生。

sentences.en: She wondered what would happen if her parents found her.
sentences.cn: 她不知道如果父母找到自己会有什么结果。

sentences.en: Stop waiting for things to happen. Make them happen.
sentences.cn: 不要坐等事情发生。要创造条件让它们发生。

sentences.en: This is such an unforeseeable situation that anything could happen.
sentences.cn: 这种情况很难预测，什么事都有可能发生。

sentences.en: This kind of thing happens all the time.
sentences.cn: 这种事一直在发生。

sentences.en: This was bound to happen sooner or later.
sentences.cn: 这事注定早晚会发生。

sentences.en: To start with, where and when did it happen?
sentences.cn: 首先，这事发生在何时何地？

sentences.en: We happened to discover we had a friend in common.
sentences.cn: 我们碰巧发现我们有个共同的朋友。

sentences.en: We’ll still be friends, whatever happens.
sentences.cn: 不管发生什么，我们仍然是朋友。

sentences.en: we've got a room vacant, as it happens.
sentences.cn: 实际上我们有一间房空着。

sentences.en: When did the accident happen?
sentences.cn: 事故什么时候发生的？

sentences.en: When events happen that shake these beliefs, our fear takes control.
sentences.cn: 当一些事情的发生动摇这些信念时，恐惧就会占据我们的心灵。

sentences.en: When sound travels through water, strange things can happen.
sentences.cn: 当声音在水中传播时，可能会发生奇怪的现象。

words.tran_cn: 偶然的；随便的；无计划的

trans.tran_en: when something happens, there is an event, especially one that is not planned
when something happens, there is an event, especially one that is not planned
